items.name: Realization
items.desc: New understanding that comes from deep thought

items.name: Musing
items.desc: Random thoughts dancing around

items.name: Luxury
items.desc: A state of comfort and elegance

items.name: Break-in Setup
items.desc: Intel, resources, tools, and the mindset required for breaking into a place and stealing something

items.name: Looks
items.desc: Who knew you would come to improve your appearance

items.name: Think about life
items.desc: What I have done and what I will do

items.name: Reflective mood
items.desc: A state of mind conducive to deep thought (some actions and power ups can only be done while the effect is active)

items.name: Deep thinking
items.desc: Way beyond surface thought

items.name: Hidden stash
items.desc: Set up a momentary stash of money. Not the safest thing in the world so can't keep it forever.

items.name: Steal
items.desc: Take what you want

items.name: Breaking and taking
items.desc: Enter into a building and take what you can

items.name: Mansion hoist
items.desc: Finally time to steal big from those rich bastards

items.name: Steal like a thief
items.desc: Be true to what you are

items.name: Criminal smile
items.desc: A smile that hides true intentions

items.name: Criminal smile II
items.desc: A sly smile that hides true intentions

items.name: Criminal smile III
items.desc: A radiant smile that hides true intentions

items.name: Shadow Hand
items.desc: The invisible hand of theft

items.name: Incentived crime
items.desc: Offer luxuries and a good life to motivate your followers

items.name: Grand Theft
items.desc: Why steal less if you can steal more?

items.name: Extravagant life
items.desc: Live the good life

items.name: Focus on looks
items.desc: Honing attraction while resting

items.name: Read The Guide of the Perplexed
items.desc: It's a tough read. Hard to believe a Jewish book could be found in this town

items.name: Growth IV
items.desc: You seem to have reached yet a new stage in life?

items.name: Periodic house reports
items.desc: Make your followers gather intel on various houses and schedules

items.name: Crime tax
items.desc: Retain some of the revenue from the criminal activities of your followers

items.name: Distributed wallet
items.desc: Ask your followers to hold on to some of your coins

items.name: Money guards
items.desc: Train some of your henchmen as thugs to keep your home safe. That way you can finally store larger amounts of money in peace

items.name: Crime groundwork
items.desc: Now that you have the criminal know-how and a safe place to store things, you can aim higher

items.name: Prepare for breaking in
items.desc: Prepare yourself and your tools for commiting buglary

items.name: Muse away
items.desc: Think away, give your musings space to breath

items.name: Scribe holy scriptures
items.desc: Copy the holy documents to spread the word

items.name: Amusement memory
items.desc: Think up ways to organize memory and clean up space for your musings

items.name: Copy The Art of Studying
items.desc: Scribe a short essay on how to optimize studying

items.name: Copy Meno
items.desc: A work from Plato, it mentions anamnesis

items.name: Debate with beggars
items.desc: Where to beg, how to live, fairness of the world

items.name: Debate with the townsfolk
items.desc: Are the taxes just? Should we support the church? Is it really a sin?

items.name: Dialect Breakthrough
items.desc: All your experience debating will guide you to new knowledge

items.name: Dialect Breakthrough II
items.desc: All your experience debating will guide you even higher

items.name: Debate with acolytes
items.desc: What is free will? What does this scripture say? Which of us will become priest?

items.name: Debate with university students
items.desc: How to prove the divine is real? Is the soul immortal? Should the academy be involved in politics?

items.name: Debate with priests
items.desc: Are there unforgivable sins? What to do with a sinful bishop?

items.name: Consult with the masters
items.desc: Ask the university masters for guidance on various intellectual matters

items.name: Debate with the masters
items.desc: Is faith or reason the higher path to truth? Is this world eternal?

items.name: Discussion with a bishop
items.desc: A certain bishop desires to discuss philosophy with you

items.name: The self II
items.desc: Revisit thyself.

items.name: Falsify access to a house
items.desc: Use your forged document to obtain access to the house

items.name: Forge housing contract
items.desc: Illegaly forge a right to a small house in the city

items.name: Shower every day
items.desc: Wash yourself every single day. Smells better, cleaner, and healthier

items.name: Deep foraging
items.desc: Throughly rethink how you search for lost goods

items.name: Charismatic leadership
items.desc: Lead and charm, come followers!

items.name: Access to the eventual piece of meat
items.desc: Gain access to some meat for when you want to live the good life

items.name: Access to meat everyday
items.desc: When you wanna the red stuff every day, we got you

items.name: Spices and sugar
items.desc: Access to an assortment of various spices and sugars

items.name: Private musician
items.desc: A musician to play for you, as necessary

items.name: Order fake housing contract
items.desc: Illegaly forge a right to a small house in the city

items.name: Living quarters
items.desc: Living quarters on top of a shop. A safe place.

items.name: Modest house
items.desc: Your own house, with two floors. A bit cramped, but it's yours

items.name: Three floor house
items.desc: A fancy place, three floors, very spaceful

items.name: Thief
items.desc: A person who steals without using force

items.name: Burglar
items.desc: Keep your door's closed. Not that it will help you.

items.name: Underboss
items.desc: The sub-leader of a small crime organization in the city

items.name: Urban sage
items.desc: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself
How much you know about breaking the law

items.name: Organized crime
items.desc: Breaking the law with a big group
That which cannot be detected

items.name: Housebreaking
items.desc: The art of entering into a building when you're not supposed to do so.

items.name: Scribing
items.desc: The art of copying words. Preservation and sharing of information.

items.name: Debating
items.desc: Discussion is an exchange of knowledge; an argument an exchange of ignorance

items.name: Appearances
items.desc: Sometimes what is outside matters as much as what is inside
Some things in life require quite a bit of money

items.name: Hidden feelings
items.desc: Things inside of you, that you would rather not face

items.name: Bad memories
items.desc: When you wish you could forget all you do is remember

items.name: Hidden sadness
items.desc: There are feelings you can barely process. Your mind becomes a hideout.

items.name: Wood art
items.desc: Deeply express yourself in a piece of wood

items.name: Wood art II
items.desc: Break the current expression and bring out something new

items.name: Fairy-tale collection
items.desc: Buy a fairly expensive collection of fairy tales

items.name: Room for a hidden stash
items.desc: You can hide a little bit of money here. Maybe more if you setup a hidden stash

items.name: Stolen mirror
items.desc: Your reflection gives you time to think

items.name: Stolen clothes
items.desc: Quite the fancy clothes hidden in a merchant's house

items.name: Stolen painting
items.desc: This one is a bit hard to steal, but it looks great

items.name: Lockpick Tools
items.desc: Very useful for opening up doors

items.desc: Very useful for opening up doors

items.name: The Guide of the Perplexed
items.desc: A fairly rare book written by Maimonides

items.name: Thief gloves
items.desc: Very high quality gloves best suited for... Better not to say it

items.name: Fancy clothes
items.desc: High quality clothes. But it's a bit high maintenance

items.name: Simple chest
items.desc: A spot to keep money. It can actually hold way more, but you are afraid of thieves

items.desc: A nice antique chest that can hold quite a bit of gold. Also looks really fancy
